messages.name: createEntity
messages.description: Request to create an entity

entityTypeId.description: The entityTypeId of the type of the entity to create

properties.description: The properties of the entity to create

links.description: Links to create along with the entity

messages.name: createEntityResponse
messages.description: The response to a request to create an entity

messages.name: updateEntity
messages.description: Request to update an entity, with the properties to update

entityId.description: The entityId of the entity to update

properties.description: The properties of the entity to update, which will be merged with any other properties on the entity

messages.name: updateEntityResponse
messages.description: The response to a request to update an entity

messages.name: deleteEntity
messages.description: Request to delete an entity, expecting 'true' in response if the operation succeeds.

entityId.description: The entityId of the entity to delete

messages.name: deleteEntityResponse
messages.description: The response to a request to delete an entity

data.description: 'true' if the operation succeeded. Otherwise, errors should be returned.

messages.name: getEntity
messages.description: Request to retrieve an entity, expecting the entity in response.

entityId.description: The entityId of the entity to retrieve

messages.name: getEntityResponse
messages.description: The response to a request to get an entity

messages.name: aggregateEntities
messages.description: Request to retrieve an aggregation of entities.

messages.name: aggregateEntitiesResponse
messages.description: The response to a request to retrieve an aggregation of entities

operation.description: The aggregation operation that was applied to generate the results, including any defaults set by the application.

results.description: The entities returned by the aggregation operation

messages.name: createEntityType
messages.description: Request to create an entity type, expecting the created entity type in response.

schema.description: The schema of the entity type to create

messages.name: createEntityTypeResponse
messages.description: The response to a request to create an entityType

messages.name: updateEntityType
messages.description: Request to update an entityType, expecting the updated entityType in response.

entityTypeId.description: The entityTypeId of the entity to update

schema.description: A partial schema to apply as an update, which will be merged with any other properties on the schema

messages.name: updateEntityTypeResponse
messages.description: The response to a request to update an entity type

messages.name: deleteEntityType
messages.description: Request to delete an entityType, expecting a boolean in response.

entityTypeId.description: The entityTypeId of the entityType to delete

messages.name: deleteEntityTypeResponse
messages.description: The response to a request to delete an entity type

data.description: 'true' if the operation succeeded. Otherwise, 'errors' will be returned.

messages.name: getEntityType
messages.description: Request to retrieve an entity type, expecting the entity type in response.

entityTypeId.description: The entityTypeId of the entity type to retrieve

messages.name: getEntityTypeResponse
messages.description: The response to a request to get an entity type

messages.name: aggregateEntityTypes
messages.description: Request to retrieve an aggregation of entity types.

messages.name: aggregateEntityTypesResponse
messages.description: The response to a request to retrieve an aggregation of entity types

operation.description: The aggregation operation that was applied to generate the results, including any defaults set by the application.

results.description: The entity types returned by the aggregation operation

messages.name: createLink
messages.description: Request to create a link, expecting the created link in response.

sourceEntityId.description: The entityId of the source entity for the link

destinationEntityId.description: The entityId of the destination entity for the link

index.description: The position of this link in an ordered list of links, where ordering is important. An index of 0 represents the first position in the list.

path.description: The path or field on the entity where this link is made (e.g. 'friend', 'employer')

messages.name: createLinkResponse
messages.description: The response to a request to create a link

messages.name: updateLink
messages.description: Request to update a link, expecting the updated link in response.

linkId.description: The linkId of the entity to update

index.description: The new index the link should occupy in an ordered list of links

messages.name: updateLinkResponse
messages.description: The response to a request to update a link

messages.name: deleteLink
messages.description: Request to delete a link, expecting a boolean in response.

linkId.description: The linkId of the link to delete

messages.name: deleteLinkResponse
messages.description: The response to a request to delete a link

data.description: 'true' if the operation succeeded. Otherwise, 'errors' should be returned.

messages.name: getLink
messages.description: Request to retrieve a link, expecting the link in response.

linkId.description: The linkId of the link to retrieve

messages.name: getLinkResponse
messages.description: The response to a request to get a link

messages.name: createLinkedAggregation
messages.description: Request to create a linked aggregation, expecting the created linked aggregation in response.

sourceEntityId.description: The entityId of the source entity of this linked aggregation

path.description: The path or field on the entity where this linked aggregation is made (e.g. 'rows')

messages.name: createLinkedAggregationResponse
messages.description: The response to a request to create a linkedAggregation

messages.name: updateLinkedAggregation
messages.description: Request to update a linked aggregation, expecting the updated linked aggregation in response.

aggregationId.description: The aggregationId of the linked aggregation to update

messages.name: updateLinkedAggregationResponse
messages.description: The response to a request to update a linked aggregation

messages.name: deleteLinkedAggregation
messages.description: Request to delete a linked aggregation, expecting a boolean in response.

aggregationId.description: The aggregationId of the linked aggregation to delete

messages.name: deleteLinkedAggregationResponse
messages.description: The response to a request to delete a linked aggregation

messages.name: getLinkedAggregation
messages.description: Request to retrieve a linked aggregation, expecting the linked aggregation in response.

aggregationId.description: The aggregationId of the linkedAggregation to retrieve

messages.name: getLinkedAggregationResponse
messages.description: The response to a request to get a linkedAggregation

messages.name: uploadFile
messages.description: Request to upload a file and create an entity to store metadata about it.

file.description: The file blob, if being uploaded directly. Either 'url' or 'file' is required.

url.description: The URL to take the file from, if not being uploaded directly. Either 'url' or 'file' is required.

mediaType.description: The type of media file this is

messages.name: uploadFileResponse
messages.description: The response to a request to create an entity storing metadata about an uploaded file.

entityId.description: The entityId of the entity storing metadata about the file.

url.description: The URL the file is now being served from.

mediaType.description: The type of media file this is

messages.name: blockEntity
messages.description: The entity associated with the block

messages.name: blockGraph
messages.description: A graph of entities with the block entity at the root, resolved to the specified depth.

linkedEntities.description: The entities linked from the block entity, and potentially entities linked from them, and so on, depending on depth.

linkGroups.description: The links attached to the block or the entities provided in linkedEntities, grouped by entity and path.

depth.description: The number of links that will be followed from the block when resolving the graph.

messages.name: entityTypes
messages.description: The entity types for any entities provided to the block as part of other messages.

messages.name: linkedAggregations
messages.description: Aggregations which are linked to from the block entity.

messages.name: readonly
messages.description: Indicates if the block should display in 'readonly' mode, i.e. without editing controls.
